name: Grotesque Beauty
detailed_description:
Anita has been experiencing bad dreams each night, it hasn't helped that her parents are often working through the night, leaving her home alone. Her friend, Rachel, agrees to come over to keep her company and allay her dark premonition. However, their night gets a whole lot bizarre from there, when Rachel discovers a haunting painting that adorns her friend's living room.

Grotesque Beauty is a single-sitting horror narrative game featuring branching paths and multiple gruesome endings. The game focuses on building an eerie atmosphere and haunting visuals rather than relying on jumpscares. The story takes inspiration from the works of acclaimed horror creator Junji Ito and puts the players in the driving seat.


  • A story that sets the scene gradually, letting the mysteries and sense of dread build before the nightmare truly begins.
  • Creepy atmosphere that will make your skin crawl.
  • Animated characters.
  • Tons of unique illustrated artwork.
  • Ambient soundtrack.
  • Branching paths that rewards repeat playthroughs.
  • Multiple endings.


A demo of Grotesque Beauty is available to play. Download via the button on the right.
